comment: Weird and hilarious but maybe teaches a little hard for undergrads. I felt bad for the people who didn't understan him all the time though.
He's so good... if you like books.
I loved this class. Super-smart, super-nice. I'd love to take another of his classes. Sometimes he says the funniest stuff.
pretty funny guy. class is easy if you do the reading.
I enjoyed this class. Show up to class, do the assignments, and write the papers and youll do fine. I made an A. I would recommend him.

I did not like this teacher. I regret not withdrawling from his class. He is very hard to follow. He talks very fast and his language is very difficult to understand. Content was very out there. His content consisted of violence and sexual topics.

Class schedule was to watch & review several movies & tv shows throughout the semester. My advice for the few students to whom this applies: If MPAA ratings & the "adult content" labels mean a lot to you, be careful in this class. We viewed a lot of material that could ruffle feathers (when it comes to social issues). Primarily all R-rated material

I read all the comments before taking this class but I have to say I disliked this class very much. His grading style is weird and I had a hard time following what he had to say. He has a very round about way of getting his point across. I didnt become a better write because of him. I got an A but I would NOT recommend him.

Most of the class is discussion. The book is only used in the first 5 mins of class ( I'd go to class a few times to see which book you need because 2 of 3 you don't use). I've had him two semesters (1101 and 1102) and love him. The essays aren't bad... I made all B's on my essays and I somehow ended with an A in the class (attendance maybe?). A+
hugh is a very good teacher i recommend him to all students

He is a great guy with a unique teaching style. I love going to his classes because it is never boring. We do more talking in class than anything else. Another good thing is that there are no tests but there are essays.
Very cool...super nice. He likes to incoporate film into his teaching. Oh yeah he's pretty funny too. If you read the stories and are there for the movies it's an easy a
Cool teacher. grades papers very easy. Dont have to read much, class was not too bad.
This guy is awesome.  You can do very mimimal work and easily come out of the class with an A in the class.
great class

it can be a hard class, but he knows his information!And if you are having trouble or have questions, he is willing to help!  It is not a class you should slack off in, so do the readings and work on your papers!
The dude rocks.  He' laughes at all of the wrong things and findes natural disasters and thousands of birds crashing into the ground a funny thing.  Enough Said...he rocks.
this class kicked ass!
sheehys class was really boring and is completely based upon environmental issues. so if you LOVE writing 5-10 page papers on global warming, hes the teacher for you!

Boring...global warming overload.out there.I didnt understand half the stuff he said.it was more of an environmental english class...i wouldve taken environmental science if i wanted all that information.he takes forever to get to the point.i wouldnt take him again.

This guy will mke your brain do gymnastics in a good way. He digs deep into these books, but he honestly respects when you respond in papers and quizzes with your own interpretation, even if it's stupid. So glad I took him, would love to take another of his classes.

I honestly didn't like him at first, but by the end of the semester he grew on me. He's a deep thinker;sometimes finding angles in stories you didn't know were there. He likes to discuss a lot of debatable subjects. Yes, his grading of papers is weird but fair. If you really try on papers he'll see it. If you ask for help he'll give it. good guy

Very out there teacher.Weird grading system on papers. His comments do not make sense that he puts on papers. His comments are all personal beliefs and if he does not like what you wrote he will give you a  horrible grade on the paper. I would not take this teacher period. STAY AWAY!

Sheehy goes very deep into the literature discussed. If you like hashing out books and having deep discussions about them, he's your guy. He is very smart, therefore sometimes hard to follow. But, I feel like I learned a lot from him.
He was a great teacher. Good sense of humor. Just do your readings and do well on your papers. There are only three papers, so work hard on them.
